title: Paul Cezanne The Three Skulls T-Shirt
description:
T-shirt developed from Paul Cezanne’s The Three Skulls, 1902-06, from The Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

This T-Shirt features an iconic work by Paul Cézanne. Cézanne's preoccupation with death was an ongoing theme that can be identified in a number of still life skull paintings that he produced between 1898 and 1906. These paintings, produced in both oils and watercolor, offer a more subtle representation of the traditional theme of vanitas.   

  • Sizes:  S, M, L, XL, XXL.
  • Material: 100% Cotton, small flecks are part of the fabric’s natural content.
